channel.title: BUbuisnessAndMarket
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from BUbuisnessAndMarket, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Tesla stock slips after EV maker misses estimates on deliveries
item.description: Tesla's third-quarter deliveries report follows a rally in the stock price over the past few months.

item.title: Private sector of U.S. economy generated 143,000 new jobs in September: ADP
Tesla’s stock falls in premarket after quarterly vehicle-delivery numbers
Blue-chip Dow turns positive near midmorning, led by Salesforce and UnitedHealth
Trump vs. Harris: How the election will affect EV adoption
item.description: With electric vehicles, there’s a sense we're in suspended animation, holding our breaths to see who wins the presidential election.

item.title: How to keep betting on a Meta breakout with protection in case of a pullback
item.description: Tony Zhang breaks down how to do a put vertical spread using options.

item.title: You can own one of Tom Brady’s watches—if you’re willing to shell out up to $800,000
item.description: The seven-time Super Bowl quarterback Sotheby’s auction begins in December.

item.title: Ford says it now trails only Tesla in U.S. electric-vehicle sales
Nike stock dives after sneaker giant scraps investor day amid CEO shakeup
item.description: Analysts appear largely confident in Elliott Hill’s ability to spark a revival at Nike, but many also see a stock in limbo short-term.

item.title: From Pearl Harbor to Sept. 11, here’s how stocks tend to react when wars start
Why Aflac’s CIO won’t ever be first to market with generative AI—but is still finding ways to adopt the technology
item.description: Aflac CIO Shelia Anderson's approach to generative AI is conservative, but with the proper guardrails and education in place, the insurance company ex...

item.title: China stock ETFs rip higher even as mainland markets close for holiday
item.description: Exchange-traded funds overseas that track Chinese stocks continued their rally Wednesday even as mainland markets were shut for a week-long holiday.

item.title: Ford's third-quarter sales up 0.7% as GM overtakes it in EVs
item.description: Ford on Wednesday reported a 0.7% increase in third-quarter U.S. new vehicle sales, including a 12.2% increase in EVs compared to a year earlier.

item.title: Michael Jordan's 23XI Racing team sues NASCAR and CEO Jim France
item.description: Michael Jordan's racing team and fellow team Front Row Motorsports said NASCAR has used anticompetitive practices to prevent fair compensation in the ...

item.title: The billionaire Murdoch heirs are battling for Fox News and their lucrative media empire in a Succession-style court drama
item.description: "'King Lear' is the greatest example in the English language of how not to do estate planning. This kind of reminds me of that."
